name: DexManagerFacet
description: Dex Manager Facet. Facet contract for managing approved DEXs to be used in swaps.

eventDecorators.name: DexAdded
eventDecorators.description: Events ///. Emitted when someone's membership role is being updated.

eventDecorators.name: DexRemoved
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when someone's membership role is being updated.

eventDecorators.name: FunctionSignatureApprovalChanged
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when someone's membership role is being updated.

functionDecorators.name: addDex
functionDecorators.description: Register the address of a DEX contract to be approved for swapping.

parameterDecorators.name: _dex
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the DEX contract to be approved.

functionDecorators.name: approvedDexs
functionDecorators.description: Returns a list of all approved DEX addresses.

functionDecorators.name: batchAddDex
functionDecorators.description: Batch register the addresss of DEX contracts to be approved for swapping.

parameterDecorators.name: _dexs
parameterDecorators.description: The addresses of the DEX contracts to be approved.

functionDecorators.name: batchRemoveDex
functionDecorators.description: Batch unregister the addresses of DEX contracts approved for swapping.

parameterDecorators.name: _dexs
parameterDecorators.description: The addresses of the DEX contracts to be unregistered.

functionDecorators.name: batchSetFunctionApprovalBySignature
functionDecorators.description: Batch Adds/removes a specific function signature to/from the allowlist.

parameterDecorators.name: _approval
parameterDecorators.description: whether the function signatures should be allowed.

functionDecorators.name: isFunctionApproved
functionDecorators.description: Returns whether a function signature is approved.

functionDecorators.name: removeDex
functionDecorators.description: Unregister the address of a DEX contract approved for swapping.

parameterDecorators.name: _dex
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the DEX contract to be unregistered.

functionDecorators.name: setFunctionApprovalBySignature
functionDecorators.description: Adds/removes a specific function signature to/from the allowlist.

parameterDecorators.name: _approval
parameterDecorators.description: whether the function signature should be allowed.
